## Welcome!

Additionally, I am engaged as a student assistant with the [Remote Sensing and Geoinformatics group](https://www.geo.fu-berlin.de/geog/fachrichtungen/geoinformatik/index.html) at the Freie Universit√§t Berlin. 


**My research interests:** Numerical modeling of surface processes, spatial data analysis applied to hazard and risk assessment.
